divs: sighting details my extended family and i were preparing a dinner while on vacation at pawleys island, sc. there were 8 to 10 of us there ages 8 to 52, males and females. someone shouted, "look at the ufos over there!" and sure enough, as i looked i saw the 5 dancing lights bouncing around very much like the way the sighting looked in the recent great britain video taken outside a pub. i had actually seen the exact same phenomenon in 1975, at lake bowen, in inman, sc when i was 19 years old. a friend and i were sitting on the dock and it was probably about 10:30 to 12:00 pm\am and i was so excited and was yelling up toward the lake houses of my parents and our neighbors, trying, especially, to get my mom down to the dock before the ufos disappeared because my mother had seen one in washington, dc in 1952 and had been interviewed by the project blue book people and is a big believer, as am i. my dock friend was truly the skeptical type but even he had to admit that it was a weird sight. during the 2003 event i tried desparately to get in touch with any radio station to let someone know about the ufos but they soon just vanished off into space as did the ones in the 1975 viewing. in 1976 i witnessed, by myself while driving away from someone's house ,a ufo which just hovered and made no sound. it was not a star (too big) and ofcourse, not an airplane. i just sat on the road in my car and stared at it up in the sky. it was probably about midnight, or later, and it occurred in a rural area outside clemson, sc. it felt as though we were having a staring contest though i could not see any type of being inside, or anything, but the craft just kept staying there, not moving, until i finally got tired and drove back to where i was staying. but the interesting thing is is that both times i saw groupings they were in a cluster of 5, some going to the left, some the right, some down, some up - no particular pattern. and the span of years was 28 years! why doesn't congress talk about this?!!! we as americans have got to get the dialog going and out in the public realm. this is insane to keep everything so "secret" when everybody knows it's really no secret, as millions of witnesses have seen unexplained flying objects. the disclosure project is great, but the national press club meeting was 8 years ago! hello?! i am hopeful this information is somehow helpful. wish i'd done more "digging" on my own and had known about mufon and it's too bad the sigthtings were so long ago, but every bit of witness testimony must help the cause, i imagine, to get legislators and whomever interested enough to declassify all the documents area 51 and the military are holding. best regards, dc
Summary: 5 star-like objects jumped around up and down, sideways, completely unlike any airplanes
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pawleys Island
There were no other sightings in Pawleys Island on or around July 9th 2003
